E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 4/28/1974
Subject: Kevin Browning learns new position
Kevin Browning has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1974
Subject: Progress of Darryl Jones
Dear Sir,
Darryl Jones has an AVG of .343 at A Reno Silver Sox!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1974
Subject: Status of Jim Obradovich
Dear Sir,
Jim Obradovich has an AVG of .227 at AA San Antonio Brewers!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1974
Subject: Status of Wilson Fason
Dear Sir,
Wilson Fason shouldn't play at AA San Antonio Brewers!
He has an AVG of .241 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
